thread.title: The Strategic Place to Stay in New York -
thread.title_full: The Strategic Place to Stay in New York - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 502beverlyc
title: The Strategic Place to Stay in New York -
text: Booking at Hotel Belleclaire on my first personal travel to New York was a choice I'm glad to have made. Its location is very accessible. The hotel is very near to places of interest in New York. My request for hotel transfer services (from and to the JFK Airport) was promptly and readily arranged. Based on my experience, this is the best and most convenient place to stay in New York.
